title: The Effects of Changes in Foreign Exchange Rates (Ind AS 21) Disclosure Checklist

sections.title: The Effects of Changes in Foreign Exchange Rates
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under Ind AS 21.

items.question: Has the entity disclosed **exchange differences recognised in profit or loss**, except for those arising on financial instruments measured at fair value through profit or loss in accordance with Ind AS 109?

Has the entity disclosed **net exchange differences recognised in other comprehensive income and accumulated in a separate component of equity**, along with a reconciliation of such exchange differences at the beginning and end of the period?

If the presentation currency is different from the functional currency, has the entity **stated that fact together with disclosure of the functional currency and the reason for using a different presentation currency**?

Has the entity disclosed any **change in the functional currency** of either the reporting entity or a significant foreign operation, along with the **reason for the change in functional currency and the date of change in functional currency**?

If financial statements or other financial information are presented in a currency different from the functional currency or presentation currency, and the requirements of paragraph 21.55 are not met, has the information been **clearly identified as supplementary information** to distinguish it from Ind AS compliant information?

If financial statements or other financial information are presented in a currency different from the functional currency or presentation currency, and the requirements of paragraph 21.55 are not met, has the entity **disclosed the currency in which the supplementary information is displayed**?

If financial statements or other financial information are presented in a currency different from the functional currency or presentation currency, and the requirements of paragraph 21.55 are not met, has the entity **disclosed its functional currency and the method of translation used to determine the supplementary information**?
